TITLE.P: Procurement of parallel framework agreements for consultancy services for NAV

SHORT_DESCR.P: The Directorate of Labour and Welfare invites tenderers to a limited tender contest in connection with the procurement of parallel framework agreements for consultancy services.

The contracts will cover the need for competence that the Contracting Authority does not have access to in its own agency at any given time, or where there is a need for extra capacity. The contracts can also be used for external quality assurance.

The contract is for the Norwegian Directorate of Labour and Welfare [Arbeids- og velferdsdirektoratet]. Other NAV entities (government part) have an option to use the contract. Entities exercising their option within a lot (area of expertise) are obligated to make a call-off on the framework agreements within the same lot (area of expertise) if additional needs for consultancy services arise during the term of the Contract.
The maximum value per lot (area of expertise) is 25% over the estimated total value.

TITLE.P: Lot (area of expertise) 1 - Recruiting assistance - upper management, directors

SHORT_DESCR.P: Full recruitment process of upper management positions at the senior management level; this may be, for example, directors of departments in the Directorate, line directors, county directors, etc.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contracting authority (the Customer) has the option to prolong the contract for an additional 1 + 1 year.

CRITERIA_CANDIDATE.P: The selection of tenderers will be based on the degree of fulfilment of the qualification requirements for relevant experience from similar deliveries/assignments as stated in the Mercell portal.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contract is for the Norwegian Directorate of Labour and Welfare [Arbeids- og velferdsdirektoratet]. Other NAV entities (government part) have an option to use the contract. Entities exercising their option within a lot (area of expertise) are obligated to make a call-off on the framework agreements within the same lot (area of expertise) if additional needs for consultancy services arise during the term of the Contract.

TITLE.P: Lot (area of expertise 2 - Recruiting assistance - manager and employees

SHORT_DESCR.P: - Full recruitment process of management positions at lower levels; this may be, for example, managers of sections or offices

- Full recruitment process of key personnel, specialists and other employees. This applies in particular within finance and security, but also other categories except for IT/technology-oriented positions.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contracting authority (the Customer) has the option to prolong the contract for an additional 1 + 1 year.

CRITERIA_CANDIDATE.P: The selection of tenderers will be based on the degree of fulfilment of the qualification requirements for relevant experience from similar deliveries/assignments as stated in the Mercell portal.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contract is for the Norwegian Directorate of Labour and Welfare [Arbeids- og velferdsdirektoratet]. Other NAV entities (government part) have an option to use the contract. Entities exercising their option within a lot (area of expertise) are obligated to make a call-off on the framework agreements within the same lot (area of expertise) if additional needs for consultancy services arise during the term of the Contract.

TITLE.P: Lot (area of expertise) 3 - Recruiting assistance - IT-personnel (employees)

SHORT_DESCR.P: - Full recruitment process of IT personnel. This applies in particular to positions within IT security and development, but applies to all categories related to IT/technology-oriented positions.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contracting authority (the Customer) has the option to prolong the contract for an additional 1 + 1 year.

CRITERIA_CANDIDATE.P: The selection of tenderers will be based on the degree of fulfilment of the qualification requirements for relevant experience from similar deliveries/assignments as stated in the Mercell portal.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contract is for the Norwegian Directorate of Labour and Welfare [Arbeids- og velferdsdirektoratet]. Other NAV entities (government part) have an option to use the contract. Entities exercising their option within a lot (area of expertise) are obligated to make a call-off on the framework agreements within the same lot (area of expertise) if additional needs for consultancy services arise during the term of the Contract.

TITLE.P: Lot (area of expertise) 4 - Business and financial management

SHORT_DESCR.P: - Development of business and financial management
- Quality review and overview of challenges in accounting and budgeting processes
- Self-service and automated finance and management processes
- Development of financial management information and provision of data
- Analyses and insight as a basis for decisions
- Government accounting standards and accounting expertise

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contracting authority (the Customer) has the option to prolong the contract for an additional 1 + 1 year.

CRITERIA_CANDIDATE.P: The selection of tenderers will be based on the degree of fulfilment of the qualification requirements for relevant experience from similar deliveries/assignments as stated in the Mercell portal.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contract is for the Norwegian Directorate of Labour and Welfare [Arbeids- og velferdsdirektoratet]. Other NAV entities (government part) have an option to use the contract. Entities exercising their option within a lot (area of expertise) are obligated to make a call-off on the framework agreements within the same lot (area of expertise) if additional needs for consultancy services arise during the term of the Contract.

TITLE.P: Lot (area of expertise) 5 - Project management, architecture and business consultancy

SHORT_DESCR.P: - Project management of mainly large and medium-seized projects, for example, within digitalisation and process development
- Support for project managers, team leaders, product leaders, etc. in fields such as
- Assistance within company architecture, business architecture, system architecture and information architecture with services related to:
--- Creating and providing a comprehensive overview of the company
--- Providing advice and assistance with development measures
--- Drive or contribute to processes to develop and/or anchor decision-making proposals
--- Contribute to setting frameworks and directions for innovation and development initiatives
- Strategic staffing management, including the use of and interaction between recruitment, development, restructuring and discontinuation

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contracting authority (the Customer) has the option to prolong the contract for an additional 1 + 1 year.

CRITERIA_CANDIDATE.P: The selection of tenderers will be based on the degree of fulfilment of the qualification requirements for relevant experience from similar deliveries/assignments as stated in the Mercell portal.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contract is for the Norwegian Directorate of Labour and Welfare [Arbeids- og velferdsdirektoratet]. Other NAV entities (government part) have an option to use the contract. Entities exercising their option within a lot (area of expertise) are obligated to make a call-off on the framework agreements within the same lot (area of expertise) if additional needs for consultancy services arise during the term of the Contract.

TITLE.P: Lot (area of expertise) 6 - Strategy and organisational development

SHORT_DESCR.P: Mainly at the general agency level, but may also be relevant at the unit level.
- Consultancy, process management and process support, as well as related methods and tools
- Development of management information as goals, management parameters and management indicators
- Organisational design, work processes, roles and responsibilities
- Change management, digital transformation for managers
- Organisational culture analysis/review and evaluation of the organisation
- Strategic competence work, development, management and mapping
- Organisational and personnel analyses, including obtaining and comparing data, analyses and decision bases.
- Analyses and insight work as a basis for decision-making (within the themes specified above)

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contracting authority (the Customer) has the option to prolong the contract for an additional 1 + 1 year.

CRITERIA_CANDIDATE.P: The selection of tenderers will be based on the degree of fulfilment of the qualification requirements for relevant experience from similar deliveries/assignments as stated in the Mercell portal.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contract is for the Norwegian Directorate of Labour and Welfare [Arbeids- og velferdsdirektoratet]. Other NAV entities (government part) have an option to use the contract. Entities exercising their option within a lot (area of expertise) are obligated to make a call-off on the framework agreements within the same lot (area of expertise) if additional needs for consultancy services arise during the term of the Contract.

SHORT_DESCR.P: --- Security legislation and best practices for security areas
--- Risk management and third-party risk management (TPRM)
- Physical security of buildings and areas
- Expertise in audit/verification of security assessments and controls in flexible development
- Consultancy and development of processes, methods and support materials
- Management for hire at different levels, e.g. management in anticipation of hiring, operations centre manager, CISO, security team

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contracting authority (the Customer) has the option to prolong the contract for an additional 1 + 1 year.

CRITERIA_CANDIDATE.P: The selection of tenderers will be based on the degree of fulfilment of the qualification requirements for relevant experience from similar deliveries/assignments as stated in the Mercell portal.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contract is for the Norwegian Directorate of Labour and Welfare [Arbeids- og velferdsdirektoratet]. Other NAV entities (government part) have an option to use the contract. Entities exercising their option within a lot (area of expertise) are obligated to make a call-off on the framework agreements within the same lot (area of expertise) if additional needs for consultancy services arise during the term of the Contract.

SHORT_DESCR.P: - Legal advice, both individual questions and major review work. Especially in relation to
--- General administrative law including the Freedom of Information Act
- Legal advice related to information security and privacy law in general
- Legal assistance for IT development to ensure privacy by design and regulatory compliance in general
-Privacy impact assessments and data processing agreements in particular
- Privacy law competence connected to information management
- Assistance related to public procurements and contract management
- Assistance related to equality and discrimination law
- Assistance with legal disputes, in particular in the areas mentioned above.

Please note that for this lot (area of expertise) the following requirements are set forth in Part III of the Tender Documentation: The resources offered must be lawyers with a valid Norwegian licence to practise law or assistant lawyers with a valid authorisation, and possibly others who comply with Chapter 10 of the Lawyer Regulations.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contracting authority (the Customer) has the option to prolong the contract for an additional 1 + 1 year.

CRITERIA_CANDIDATE.P: The selection of tenderers will be based on the degree of fulfilment of the qualification requirements for relevant experience from similar deliveries/assignments as stated in the Mercell portal.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contract is for the Norwegian Directorate of Labour and Welfare [Arbeids- og velferdsdirektoratet]. Other NAV entities (government part) have an option to use the contract. Entities exercising their option within a lot (area of expertise) are obligated to make a call-off on the framework agreements within the same lot (area of expertise) if additional needs for consultancy services arise during the term of the Contract.

SUITABILITY.P: Qualification Requirements: Tenderers are required to be a legally established company.

Documentation requirement: Norwegian tenderers: Company registration certificate from the Brønnøysund Register Centre. Foreign Tenderers: Certificate for registration in the Register of Business Enterprises as prescribed in the legislation of the country in which the tenderer is established.
Qualification requirement: Norwegian tenderers must have their tax and VAT payments in order.

Documentation requirement: Norwegian tenderers: A Tax and VAT certificate from the tax authorities. The certificate shall not be older than 6 months from the deadline for requests to participate in the tender contest.

ECONOMIC_FINANCIAL_INFO.P: Qualification requirement: The tenderer is required to have sufficient economic capacity to fulfil the contract.

Documentation requirement: The contracting authority will obtain a credit rating carried out by Experian; see www.Experian.no. If a tenderer believes that the credit rating will not provide an accurate picture, supplementary information is to be attached to the request for qualification.

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_INFO.P: Qualification requirement: Relevant experience from similar deliveries/assignments is required.

Documentation requirement: The tenderer's 3 most important deliveries over the last 3 years, including a description of the assignments, their scope/value, date and recipients. The template in the qualification documentation, annex 2, must be used to document fulfilment of the requirement.
